Task list items tests.

gfm* from https://github.github.com/gfm/#task-list-items-extension-
(version 0.29-gfm (2019-04-06))

Others by hand, guessing based on GitHub behavior.

-- parser.json --
{"TaskListItems": true}
-- gfm279.md --
- [ ] foo
- [x] bar
-- gfm279.html --
<ul>
<li><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
</ul>
-- gfm280.md --
- [x] foo
  - [ ] bar
  - [x] baz
- [ ] bim
-- gfm280.html --
<ul>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo
<ul>
<li><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> baz</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> bim</li>
</ul>
-- spaces.md --
-  [ ] foo
-   [x] bar
- [ ]quux
-- spaces.html --
<ul>
<li><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
<li>[ ]quux</li>
</ul>
-- wxyz.md --
- [w] woolloomooloo
- [x] foo
- [y] bar
- [z] baz
-- wxyz.html --
<ul>
<li>[w] woolloomooloo</li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li>[y] bar</li>
<li>[z] baz</li>
</ul>
-- X.md --
- [x] foo
- [X] bar
- [ ] baz
-- X.html --
<ul>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
<li><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> baz</li>
</ul>
-- 1.md --
- [x] foo
-
- [x] bar
- hello
- > quote
- *emph*
-- 1.html --
<ul>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</li>
<li></li>
<li><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</li>
<li>hello</li>
<li>
<blockquote>
<p>quote</p>
</blockquote>
</li>
<li><em>emph</em></li>
</ul>
-- 2.md --
- [x] foo
-
- [x] bar

- hello
-- 2.html --
<ul>
<li>
<p><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> foo</p>
</li>
<li></li>
<li>
<p><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox"> bar</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>hello</p>
</li>
</ul>
